abstract: Eli Lilly & Co releases data showing its experimental Alzheimer's drug solanezumab may be effective in mild cases; Biogen releases mixed results from its drug aducanumab.
lead_paragraph: Solanezumab, from Eli Lilly, is getting another look for mild cases, and Biogen said data from a small group taking aducanumab showed mixed results.

headline.main: New Data on 2 Alzheimer’s Drugs Alters Hope and Expectation
headline.print_headline: New Data on 2 Alzheimer’s Drugs Alter Hope and Expectation for Treatments

snippet: Solanezumab, from Eli Lilly, is getting another look for mild cases, and Biogen said data from a small group taking aducanumab showed mixed results.
